languages.text: "Значит, эта вымученная беседа была для того, чтобы изучить меня?"

traits.locale_text: "Значит, эта вымученная беседа была для того, чтобы изучить меня?"

languages.text: "What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"
languages.original_text: "Значит, эта вымученная беседа была для того, чтобы изучить меня?"

traits.locale_text: "What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"
"What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"
"What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"
"What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"

languages.text: “你是想说，我们这场费劲的谈话，仅仅是因为你打算研究我这个人吗？”
languages.original_text: "What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"

traits.locale_text: “你是想说，我们这场费劲的谈话，仅仅是因为你打算研究我这个人吗？”

languages.text: «Entonces, ¿toda esta conversación es un pretexto para estudiarme?».
languages.original_text: "What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"

traits.locale_text: «Entonces, ¿toda esta conversación es un pretexto para estudiarme?».

languages.text: 「つまり、この労苦は私を知るための口実だというわけか？」
languages.original_text: "What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、この労苦は私を知るための口実だというわけか？」

languages.text: « Vous voulez donc dire que toute cette conversation laborieuse n'était qu'un prétexte pour m'étudier ? »
languages.original_text: "What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez donc dire que toute cette conversation laborieuse n'était qu'un prétexte pour m'étudier ? »

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr mir also sagen, dass unser schwerfälliges Gespräch nur ein Vorwand war, um mehr über mich herauszufinden?"
languages.original_text: "What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr mir also sagen, dass unser schwerfälliges Gespräch nur ein Vorwand war, um mehr über mich herauszufinden?"

languages.text: "Yani bu yorucu sohbetin, beni incelemek için bir mazeret olduğunu mu söylüyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "What you are saying is that this laboured conversation was a pretext for studying me?"
